page.title: 04A HEALTH WORKER'S WEEK
page.content: MONDAY:AM. GOES TO OFFICE AT GLOUCESTER ROYAL HOSPITAL WHERE SHE ANSWERS CALLS. THEN SHE GOES TO VISIT CHILDREN UNDER 1 YEAR. P.M. SHE VISITS ANTE-NATAL CLINIC. TUESDAY:A.M.SHE VISITS SCHOOLS AND GIVES HEALTH TALKS. P.M.VISITS FAMILY CENTRE AT PARTON MANOR SCHOOL AND TAKES EXERCISE CLASSES FOR MOTHERS. WEDNESDAY:VISITS NEW BORN BABIES TO WEIGH THEM AND TO CHECK HOW THEY ARE GROWING. THURSDAY:A.M.VISITS CHILDREN UNDER 5 IN PLAYGROUPS TO SEE IF THEY CAN WALK, TALK AND PLAY WITH OTHER CHILDREN. P.M.GOES TO BABY CLINIC TO WEIGH AND CHECK BABIES DEVELOPMENT. FRIDAY:A.M. VISITS CHILDREN WHO HAVE DEVELOPMENT PROBLEMS. P.M. VISITS CHILDREN UNDER 5 TO SEE IF THEY ARE READY TO START SCHOOL.
